table.name: main_pa_appraisalhistory
table.Comment: gives history of each employee's appraisal

table.name: main_pa_category
table.Comment: This table is used to add questions category(Questionaire)

table.name: main_pa_employee_ratings
table.Comment: Employee appraisal response is stored in this table

table.name: main_pa_ff_history
table.Comment: gives step by step history of feedforward

table.name: main_pa_groups
table.Comment: divide all employees into groups for easy identification for

table.name: main_pa_manager_initialization
table.Comment: Manager initialized data is stored in this table

table.name: main_pa_questions
table.Comment: stores questions for appraisal and feedforward

table.name: main_pa_questions_privileges
table.Comment: Stores the privileges of questions for each employee in json

table.name: main_pa_questions_privileges_temp
table.Comment: Stores the questions, privileges and groups when initialized

table.name: main_pa_ratings
table.Comment: This table is used to add ratings text in json format.

table.name: main_pa_skills
table.Comment: This table is used to add skills.

column.name: backgroundchk_status
column.DataType: enum('In process', 'Completed', 'Not Applicable', 'Yet to start', 'On hold')|0

column.name: cron_type
column.DataType: enum('General', 'Employee expiry', 'Requisition expiry', 'Approve leave', 'Inactive users', 'Emp docs expiry')|0

column.name: reference_contact
column.Comment: referrer contact data type is changed from bigint(20) to varchar

column.name: years_exp
column.Comment: for numbers we are using varchar datatype

column.name: extension_number
column.Comment: for numbers we are using varchar datatype

column.name: backgroundchk_status
column.DataType: enum('In process', 'Completed', 'Not Applicable', 'Yet to start', 'On hold')|0

column.name: round_status
column.DataType: enum('Schedule for next round', 'Qualified', 'Selected', 'Disqualified', 'Decision pending', 'On hold', 'Incompetent', 'Ineligible', 'Candidate no show', 'Requisition Closed/Completed')|0

column.name: round_status
column.DataType: enum('Schedule for next round', 'Qualified', 'Selected', 'Disqualified', 'Decision pending', 'On hold', 'Incompetent', 'Ineligible', 'Candidate no show', 'Requisition Closed/Completed')|0

column.name: consolidated_rating
column.Comment: Consolidated rating.Need to be updated after each manager rating.

column.name: appraisal_status
column.Comment: 1=Pending employee ratings,2=Pending L1 ratings,3=Pending L2 ratings,4=Pending L3 ratings,5=Pending L4 ratings,6=Pending L5 ratings,7=Completed,
column.DataType: enum('Pending employee ratings', 'Pending L1 ratings', 'Pending L2 ratings', 'Pending L3 ratings', 'Pending L4 ratings', 'Pending L5 ratings', 'Completed')|0

column.name: ff_period
column.Comment: 1,2,3,4 for quaterly, 1.2 for half-yearly , 1 for yearly

column.name: status
column.Comment: 1=open, 2= close ,Appraisal staus for the particular period

column.name: appraisal_period
column.Comment: 1,2,3,4 for quaterly, 1.2 for half yearly , 1 for yearly

column.name: managers_due_date
column.Comment: due date for enable to managers

column.name: employees_due_date
column.Comment: due date for enable to employees

column.name: status
column.Comment: 1=open, 2= close , 3= Force Close.Appraisal staus for the particular period

column.name: manager_ids
column.Comment: Comma separated manager ids,Whenever manager completes initalization his id has to be appended

column.name: comments
column.Comment: To capture hr comments if forceful close of initialization

column.name: selected_employee_ids
column.Comment: Comma separated employee ids selected during initialization

column.name: pa_initialization_id
column.Comment: Appraisal initialization id for appraisal else feedforward initialization id for feedforward

column.name: employee_id
column.Comment: Null for feedforward else employee id

column.name: hr_qs
column.Comment: Comma separated question ids created by hr

column.name: manager_group_id
column.Comment: group id of employees created by manager

column.name: manager_qs
column.Comment: Comma separeated question ids created by manager

column.name: ff_qs
column.Comment: Comma separeated question ids created by management

column.name: pa_initialization_id
column.Comment: Appraisal initialization id for appraisal else feedforward initialization id for feedforward

column.name: hr_qs
column.Comment: Comma separated question ids created by hr

column.name: service_desk_id
column.Comment: if request_for is equal to 2 then dump id from asset table

column.name: service_request_id
column.Comment: If request_for is equal to 2 then dump category from asset table

column.name: status
column.DataType: enum('Open', 'Cancelled', 'Management approved', 'Management rejected', 'To management approve', 'Manager approved', 'Closed', 'Rejected', 'Manager rejected', 'To manager approve')|0

column.name: service_desk_id
column.Comment: If request_for equal to 2 then dump asset id from asset table

column.name: service_desk_name
column.Comment: If request_for equal to 2 then dump asset name from asset table

column.name: service_request_name
column.Comment: If request_for equal to 2 then dump asset category from asset table

column.name: service_request_id
column.Comment: If request_for equal to 2 then dump asset name from asset_categories table

column.name: backgroundchk_status
column.DataType: enum('In process', 'Completed', 'Not Applicable', 'Yet to start', 'On hold')|0
